Container.Name: HDHomeRun-EPG
Container.Overview:
This container periodically runs the HDHomeRunEPG-to-XmlTv Python script to generate an XMLTV guide file from an HDHomeRun tuner.
Instructions: 1. Build the Dockerfile provided in the support thread. 2. Push the built image to your Docker repository. 3. Update the 'Repository' field in this template to match your image. 4. Set your HDHomeRun's IP address. 5. Configure the output path for the generated guide.xml file.

Config.Name: Output Path
Config.Description: This is where the generated guide.xml file will be stored.

Config.Name: HDHomeRun IP
Config.Description: The IP address of your HDHomeRun device on your local network.

Config.Name: Cron Schedule
Config.Description: The cron schedule for running the script. Default is daily at midnight.
